subject: Good Day To You. Reply Urgently !!!
body:
Hello Dear, 
It is a delight to have your esteemed contact.My sources of your contact gave me the courage and confidence.It is my pleasure to contact you for a business venture which i intend to establish in your country,with the help of your Embassy, i got your contact address from the commercial department in your embassy.I am Abdul-Awwal Sabur,a Gambian. Son of the Former Gambian Minister for DEFENSE and INTERIOR. 
 
There is this huge amount of US$ 6,200.000.00 (SIX MILLION TWO HUNDRED THOUSAND U.S DOLLARS). which my late Father kept for us in the SOCIETE GENERALE BANK OFSENEGAL before he was assassinated by unknown persons. Now I and my younger brother have decided to invest these Money in your Country or anywhere save enough outside Senegal for Security and Political reasons. We want you to help us claim and transfer the money into your Personal Account in your Country for investment purposes on profitable ventures.
   
If you can be of an assistance to us, we shall offer you 30% of the total sum. 

Upon your interest, I will forward you the Bank contact information.
 
My regards to you and your family.
 
Abdul-Awwal Sabur.
Villa 139 Sicap Diuppel BP 234 
Liberte, Dakar - Senegal.
